questAskText: Hey, I need you to kill those Gators.
There should be a lot on the right side.
Compelete this quest and I'll reward you.
questAcceptText: Alright then, let me teach you some basics.
Press the I key to open your inventory. You can equip items from here.
You should equip the weapon in your inventory.
While holding a weapon, press the X key to perform a basic attack
questDeclineText: Do you not want to progress in this game?
questInProgressText: Go kill the Gators then come back to me.
